title: Consumer preference : fiction versus non-fiction books in England 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 4 number of Responses.
Response Mixture of both has the highest Share of respondents and Neither has the lowest Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 36.0 between the maximum Response Mixture of both and minimum Response Neither.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Mixture of both and lowest at Response Neither.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 4 number of Responses.
Response Mixture of both has the highest Share of respondents and Neither has the lowest Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 36.0 between the maximum Response Mixture of both and minimum Response Neither.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 4 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 44.0 is found at Response Mixture of both and the minimum is found at Neither where Response is 8.0.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 36.0.
The Response Mixture of both has the highest Share of respondents, followed by , and Non-fiction. Down to the Response Neither which is the lowest.
The highest value 44.0 at Mixture of both is almost 1.76 times larger than the average value 25.0.
